response.overview: Kara Lee (Superior Girl) is forced to enter Skullions Lair in hopes of saving her human sister Alex. She agrees to fight for her freedom but sorely underestimates Skullions Monster. Kara finds herself in dire peril as he keeps getting stronger with every strike he makes. Kara's shirt is ripped open revealing her true identity on a live broadcast to fans around the world.  Superior Girl tries to finish the monster but fails to do so. Skullions beast beats and gropes the maiden of might senseless. Now unable to stop his advances, Superior Girl is humiliated physically and mentally in front of millions of fanboys. The requests start coming in but to Superior Girl's dismay, they are all for further humiliation of her! Superior Girl is completely and totally destroyed, only to later be sold off to a rich and nerdy fanboy that wants the girlfriend experience!
response.title: Public Disgrace 2
